price: Sila isaan hin beeknee? nama Rabbiifi ergamaa Isaa faallesse, ibidda jahannamtu ishee keessatti kan hafu ta’ee isaaf jira jechuu. Kun salphina guddaadha.
arabic: أَلَمۡ يَعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّهُۥ مَن يُحَادِدِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ فَأَنَّ لَهُۥ نَارَ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدٗا فِيهَاۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡخِزۡيُ ٱلۡعَظِيمُ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: alam yaʿlamū annahu man yuḥādidi al-laha warasūlahu fa-anna lahu nāra jahannama khālidan fīhā dhālika al-khiz'yu al-ʿaẓīmu
